newsitem.title: USA: CBOT says muni bond index coefficient revised.
newsitem.headline: CBOT says muni bond index coefficient revised.

text.p: The current coefficient used to calculate the Bond Buyer Municipal Bond Index has been revised to 0.9821 from 0.9823, the Chicago Board of Trade said.
The revision, listed in a notice to exchange members, took effect Friday.
The CBOT offers a futures contract based on the cash Bond Buyer index.
The prior coefficient of 0.9823 had been in effect since January 15, the CBOT added. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com))
